Package esg.saml.authz.service.impl

Class Summary
SAMLAuthorizationFactoryTrivialImpl Trivial implementation of SAMLAuthorizationFactory that returns positive authorization for a given user (for all resources and actions), negative authorization otherwise.
SAMLAuthorizationImpl  
SAMLAuthorizationServiceClientSoapImpl Implementation of SAMLAuthorizationServiceClient specific to SOAP binding.
SAMLAuthorizationServiceSoapImpl Implementation of SAMLAuthorizationService for SOAP binding.
SAMLAuthorizationsImpl Bean implementation of the SAMLAuthorizations interface.
